title: WTB: N28 Allen & Ginter - Kelly, Anson, Ward, Glasscock, Comiskey
author: helfrich91

posts.post_title: WTB: N28 Allen & Ginter - Kelly, Anson, Ward, Glasscock, Comiskey
posts.post_content:
I'm on the lookout for N28 Allen & Ginter cards of Kelly, Anson, Ward, Glasscock, and Comiskey.


Hoped someone in the Net54 community has them for sale.  
 
Lower grades with good eye appeal are preferred (1.5 to 3... "A" also would be good).

 Feel free to shoot me an email or a PM!

Hey Todd,

I have an authentic Comiskey for sale. It’s been skinned on the back but front is nice. Currently out of town this weekend but can get better pictures on Monday.

Respectfully,

Connor

Not a lower grade, but available:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=478153&d=1631294272[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=478154&d=1631294280[/IMG]

Definitely checks the boxes for good eye appeal and "A".  Unfortunately it also checks the boxes for for trimmed and skinned.  Open to an offer if someone wants it.

Jeff
